body.p:
Frankfort Sept 2. 1861
To His Excellency
Governor Magoffin

The undersigned believing that the case of Thomas Mahoney, who was fined in the city Court of Frankfort for breach of the peace about a month ago, presents reasons for Executive interposition respectfully petition your Excellency to remit his fine

S. I. M. Major
J Byron Montgomery
W. T. B South
Scott Brown

Frankfort Po. Ct
$5.} Breach
Thos. Mahoney
Respt 12 mos
Issd Sept. 2. 1861
